snippet.title: Still There - Teaser
snippet.description:
GhostShark Games, LaBoite, Demigiant and Abstraction present Still There - a sci-fi point and click adventure into space station maintenance, mysterious radio messages, rude AIs, sociopathic people in charge, and finding one's true self in a galaxy way too far, far away. 

Coming to Steam (PC, MacOs, Linux) soon.

Official Website (and newsletter): http://stillthere.ghostshark.it/
